text: 2:7 1 Timoti 4:12; 1 Pita 5:3Arazir nɨ uabɨ amiba bar, nɨ arazir aghuibara damu, eghtɨ gumazir igiaba nɨn arazibar gan dar gɨntɨgham. Egh nɨn ingangarir nɨ gumazamizibar sure gamim, nɨ me gifaran markɨ, egh nɨ dɨbovir akabav kɨm ifaghatan markɨ. Nɨ zurara guizɨn akabagh nɨghnɨgh deravɨram akam akun.
